name: Proteinsim2015
body:
### Project Info

ProteinSim 2015 is a C++ based particle simulation engine being developed for research in the K-State Physics department.

### Code Documentation

The doxygen generated documentation for the code base can be found here: http://www.sawyerhopkins.com/ProteinSim2015/html/

### TODO List

- [X] Functioning Brownian Dynamics integrator.
- [X] Multi-threading with OpenMP
- [ ] Create standardized configuration file.
- [ ] Allow forces to be loaded via dll. Possible python support.
- [ ] Build-in/Real-time plotting.
- [ ] Cluster analysis.
- [ ] CUDA Kernals (Optimistic/Far Future Goal).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
